name: Golfing With Dynamite
description:
A short game for minimalism game jam. Tactically place and blow up dynamite to bounce a golf ball to the goal.

Controls

MOUSE 1Place/replace dynamiteMOUSE 2Remove dynamiteMOUSE WHEELAdjust dynamite fuseSPACEToggle between planning phase and running phaseESCAPEToggle pause menu

Post deadline changes:

  • Fixed WebGL version index.html to better support itch.io fullscreen mode.
